# Read App Screenshot Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get information about an app screenshot and its upload and processing status.

## Getting Screenshots and Reading Information

- **List All App Screenshots for an App Screenshot Set**: List all ordered screenshots in a screenshot set.

items.description: List all ordered screenshots in a screenshot set.
